document_data.name: Snapjaw
document_data.mainbody:
'''Snapjaw''' was a [[lizardfolk]] of the [[Scaly Death]] tribe in the [[Mere of Dead Men]] during the [[Tyranny of the Dragons]].

Snapjaw was a proud lizardfolk warrior. However, like the other members of his tribe, he was recruited to work as a labourer and hunter for the [[Cult of the Dragon]]. Under orders of [[Rezmir|Rezmir the Black]], the lizardfolk were put under control of the [[bullywug]], who previously killed the tribe's leader [[Suncaller]].
